        setting - the enum setting to be used
        theme - the theme to be used
        container - whether this is a title bar
        allowSearch - whether typing in the text box is allowed
        keys - key predicates for the text box
        popupSize - the scroll behavior of the list
        popupAdder - consumer to handle adding list pop-up

        public void handleKey(Context context,
                      int scancode)
        Description copied from interface: IComponent
        Should be called by the parent when a key is typed. The current height of the component should be set by this method via Context.setHeight(int).
